import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';export var initialState={recipes:[]};// A slice for recipes with our three reducers
var recipesSlice=createSlice({name:'recipes',initialState:initialState,reducers:{getRecipesSuccess:function getRecipesSuccess(state,_ref){var payload=_ref.payload;state.recipes=payload;}}});// Three actions generated from the slice
var getRecipesSuccess=recipesSlice.actions.getRecipesSuccess;// A selector
export{getRecipesSuccess};export var recipesSelector=function recipesSelector(state){return state.recipes;};// The reducer
